data.text: Il est temps de voyager pour moins cher! Notre solde de la fête du Canada est en cours. Faites vite et économisez 40 % sur tous les tarifs de base. Tous les vols, aucune période d'interdiction. https://t.co/iEtTzo8JhZ
See more of Canada for less with our Canada Day Sale! Going on now. Check out these deals: https://t.co/E3KbCU3aA2
Découvrez le Canada à moindre coût grâce à notre solde de la fête du Canada! En cours maintenant. Découvrez ces offres : https://t.co/iEtTznR7Tp
@KP50524166 Send a detailed email and include your booking number to support@flyflair.com. You will be in their system and they will get to you.
@pimpet The customer service team has a larger than normal volume of calls. Send a detailed email with your booking number and contact information and they will get back to you.

data.text: @instagram @facebook hey we're locked out of our Instagram account! Please help!

@essQjay Send us a DM with the booking number, name and correct details.

urls.title: Flair Airlines - Best prices on flights in Canada
urls.description: Flair Airlines is here to change the way Canadians travel. Learn more about Flair Airlines, our low fares across Canada, and book your flights!

data.text: @sanderstani The customer service team currently is currently working with a higher than normal volume of calls. You can send them an email with your booking number and details at support@flyflair.com or access your booking at My Booking at https://t.co/Ehj3JcVjh5 to make changes.
@jasonChampton Rapid growth.
We're looking forward to starting in #SaintJohn on Saturday! https://t.co/Awj865OVo8

@KP50524166 The customer service team is working to catch up on the requests. Send a detailed email to support@flyflair.com and include your original booking number, contact info and clear details on what you are looking to do.

Saisissez ces offres avant qu'elles ne disparaissent! Notre solde de la fête du Canada offre 40 % de réduction sur tous les tarifs de base. Tous les vols. Aucune période d'interdiction! https://t.co/iEtTznR7Tp
Scoop up these deals before they are gone! Our Canada Day Sale has 40%-off all base fares. All flights. No blackout dates! https://t.co/E3KbCUkLrA
@GrumpyBeignet If the birthdate is incorrect, you can show up at the airport early and they can correct it at the counter. Counter opens 3 hours prior to departure.
@DTalgorn Customer support is experiencing a larger than normal volume of calls. You can email them at support@flyflair.com, include your booking number and other details and they will respond.

@essQjay The customer service team is experiencing a larger than normal volume of communications and it takes time for them to respond. If you are trying to change a passenger, reservations are non-transferable.
RT @AbbyNews: Flair Airlines offering big discounts for flights out of #Abbotsford - https://t.co/f4ggdtw3pA
@JBBUGrill We try to accommodate. See page 33-34 in our tariff: https://t.co/F9bZHCkFRj

Nous nous préparons pour la fête du Canada avec des vols au départ de Montréal et de Victoria. Puis reprise du service à Kelowna et Regina le 2 juillet. Enfin, direction Saint John pour la desserte tant attendue du Nouveau-Brunswick le juillet 3. https://t.co/2XoR4OWPf7

We're getting ready for Canada Day and flights starting in Montreal and Victoria. Then restarting service in Kelowna and Regina on July 2. Finally, it’s on to Saint John for long-awaited service to New Brunswick on July 3. https://t.co/rneltnSFi4

As we now have 20 Canadian destinations, we are celebrating with a Canada Day Sale and 40% off all base fares! Book now to save.
